niches.description: A micro-SaaS providing automated ticketing systems to reduce waiting times at transportation hubs through digital ticketing and self-service options.
pain_points_addressed: Long waiting times at transportation hubs due to manual ticketing systems.
supporting_evidence: High urgency and frequency scores for long waiting times
Multiple mentions of frustrations on social media platforms regarding ticketing delays

niches.description: An AI-driven tool that automates route planning for delivery logistics to maximize efficiency and reduce operational costs.
pain_points_addressed: Inefficient route planning for delivery logistics.
supporting_evidence: High urgency score for route planning inefficiencies
Frequent discussions about the need for better routing tools in industry forums

niches.description: A micro-SaaS that offers real-time tracking of public transport vehicles to enhance commuter experience and city planning.
pain_points_addressed: Difficulty in tracking the real-time location of public transport vehicles.
supporting_evidence: Medium urgency score for real-time tracking needs
User quotes expressing frustration with current tracking solutions
